heroIntro: A project by the GPT4 team
heroSubtitle: Here you can continue building your path!
whoWeAreText: MOVEO is a university startup dedicated to connecting workers who need reliable transportation with people willing to lend their vehicles safely and affordably.
missionText: Our mission is to democratize access to vehicles through a fair and flexible lending model, promoting mobility as a right and an opportunity for thousands of workers.
subscriptionsText: At Moveo, we work with a vehicle subscription model, where users pay for the time they use the car they choose, in a flexible and affordable way.
servicesDescription: At Moveo, we connect people who need to move with available cars near them, offering a flexible, safe, and collaborative way to rent and generate income.
service1Desc: Choose how long you need the car: hours, days, or weeks. You only pay for the time you use it.
service2Desc: Find available vehicles in parking lots near your location, ready to be used.
service3Desc: Cars are left in designated parking lots near you for added convenience.
service4Desc: Suppliers can put their cars on the road during their chosen times and earn hassle-free.
service5Desc: Monitor vehicle status, loan duration, payments, and more, all from a single platform.
service6Desc: Car owners decide when to borrow and when to retrieve their car. Complete control at all times.
pricingDescription: Signing up for Moveo is completely free. You can search for nearby cars, see prices, and choose the one that best suits your time and needs.
plan3Feature1: No hidden fees: Publishing your vehicle on Moveo is completely free.
plan3Feature2: Easy income: For every rental, you earn 20% of the total paid.
plan3Feature3_1: Turn availability on or off anytime
plan3Feature3_3: Track your carâ€™s status and manage everything from your profile
introVideoDescription: This section has been placed for videos
faqDescription: Some of the most frequently asked queries.
faq1Answer: Moveo connects people who need a car to get around with providers willing to lend them for a specific period and in exchange for a fair fee.
faq2Question: What do I need to request a car?
faq2Answer: All you need to do is register in the app, verify your identity, have a valid driver's license, and choose the vehicle that best suits your needs.
faq3Question: Can I lend my car if I don't use it daily?
faq3Answer: Yes! You can offer your car on the days and times you prefer, set your rate, and manage everything from the app.
faq4Answer: You can pay directly from the app with a debit or credit card, or digital wallet. The entire process is 100% secure.
faq5Question: What happens if an accident occurs during the loan?
faq5Answer: In the event of an incident, the assistance protocol is activated and both parties are notified. The vehicle insurance covers damages according to its terms, and Moveo provides support throughout the process.
faq6Answer: Yes, all cars on Moveo must have active insurance. Additionally, we have security policies to protect both parties.
